Hey!

I'm Stoyko Stoev, an ABAP developer at Schwarz IT Bulgaria.

Starting with a Business Bachelor at the University of Groningen, I transitioned to computer science starting with my Masters in Business Information Management at RSM, Erasmus University, and continuing with online courses from Harvard (Intro to CS), Princeton (Algorithms), Stanford (Databases) and others.

Learn more about my job or university education in my CV page, or about the online CS courses I've taken in their respective page. And/or may be read my blog! Here's a snapshot of it, with my last post:
